John 001 Bsc 234566
import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup ,FormBuilder} from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-student', templateUrl: './student.component.html', styleUrls: ['./student.component.css'] }) export class StudentComponent { userForm :FormGroup; listData: any; constructor(private fb: FormBuilder){ this.listData=[]; this.userForm = this.fb.group({ name :[''], id :[''], course :[''], number :[''] }) } addItem(){ this.listData.push(this.userForm.value); } Reset(){ this.userForm.reset(); } }
